languages.text:
This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat.
However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat.
This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text:
This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat.
However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat.
This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

languages.text: Until the end of combat, the character has their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by half, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. All effects stack.
languages.original_text: До конца боя текущие {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} персонажа сокращаются вдвое, но наносимый им {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} — на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Все эти эффекты суммируются.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the character has their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by half, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. All those effects stack.

languages.text: До конца боя текущие {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} персонажа сокращаются вдвое, но наносимый им {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} — на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Все эти эффекты суммируются.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя текущие {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} персонажа сокращаются вдвое, но наносимый им {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} — на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Все эти эффекты суммируются.

До конца боя текущие {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} персонажа сокращаются вдвое, но наносимый им {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} — на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Все эти эффекты суммируются.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、そのキャラクターの現在の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}が半減するが、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が+{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}増加する。すべての効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the character has their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by half, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. All effects stack.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die aktuelle {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} des Charakters halbiert. Ihr {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} erhöht sich um +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} %. Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} erhöht sich um +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Alle Effekte sind stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the character has their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by half, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die aktuelle {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} des Charakters halbiert. Ihr {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} erhöht sich um +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} %. Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} erhöht sich um +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Alle Effekte sind stapelbar.

languages.text: Karakterin mevcut {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerleri yarıya düşer ancak verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} +%{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} artar. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Tüm etkiler üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the character has their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by half, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Karakterin mevcut {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerleri yarıya düşer ancak verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} +%{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} artar. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Tüm etkiler üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} de ce personnage sont divisées par deux, mais ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} augmentent de +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % et ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} augmentent de +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Tous les effets se cumulent.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the character has their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by half, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} de ce personnage sont divisées par deux, mais ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} augmentent de +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % et ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} augmentent de +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Tous les effets se cumulent.

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, los valores actuales de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del personaje se reducen a la mitad, pero su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} aumenta en un +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumenta en +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Todos los efectos son acumulativos.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the character has their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by half, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, los valores actuales de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del personaje se reducen a la mitad, pero su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} aumenta en un +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumenta en +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Todos los efectos son acumulativos.

languages.text: 角色当前的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}减半，但{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%，{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}。上述效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the character has their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by half, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: 角色当前的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}减半，但{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%，{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}。上述效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
